title: Olympic legend Usain Bolt is rumoured to be back again for the Melbourne Cup
text:
Former Olympic sprinter Usain Bolt is set to make a return to the Melbourne Cup's Birdcage this year.

The runner has previously made several appearances at the annual festivities and Perth Now have said rumours indicate he will continue the trend.

Usain, known for being the world's fastest man over 100 and 200 metres, is said to be the official guest of champagne brand Mumm on Tuesday.

Here for a good time: Former Olympic sprinter Usain Bolt is rumoured to make an appearance at the Melbourne Cup on Tuesday as a guest of the champagne brand Mumm - pictured in 2018 at the event

Other sports stars such as Cadel Evans and Tom Mitchell will likely share the same tent with Usain along with Grant Denyer, Lindy Klim and Brooke Hogan.

The sprinter known for his colourful personality and outfits should sport some attention-grabbing fashion choices on the day.

Usain has spent the last few years seeking out other potential sports in which to compete, but so far nothing has solidified.

He can't win this one: Usain makes a regular appearance at the Melbourne Cup and will likely bring his colourful fashion sense to the event

In 2018 the sportsman took part in the trial with soccer team Adelaide United, however the team ultimately decided to not include him going forward.

The sprinter recently told TMZ he would even consider joining the NFL but only if he could play for The New England Patriots or the Green Bay Packers.

Instead the sprinter has been spending much of his time enjoying festivities around the world including at Oktoberfest in Germany earlier this month.

Loving the atmosphere: If the rumours are true the sprinter will be under the same tent as other sports stars such as Cadel Evans and Tom Mitchell

Usain wore a green and white checked shirt for the night out which he paired with a traditional pair of lederhosen.

The sprinter was seen grinning as he posed for selfies and drank a stein of beer.

He even jumped on stage to show off his signature Lightening Bolt move, much to the crowds delight.
description: Former Olympic sprinter Usain Bolt is rumoured to be returning to the Melbourne Cup on Tuesday and will be sponsored by champagne brand Mumm.
authors: Tom Place For Daily Mail Australia
